# YouTube Downloader - Distribution Package

## Contents
- `YouTubeDownloader.exe` - Main executable (20.3 MB)
- `Start YouTube Downloader.bat` - Easy launcher script
- `USER_GUIDE.md` - Complete user guide

## Quick Start
1. **Easy way**: Double-click `Start YouTube Downloader.bat`
2. **Direct way**: Double-click `YouTubeDownloader.exe`

## Installation
No installation required! Just copy these files to any folder and run.

## Features
✅ Standalone executable - no Python required  
✅ Download videos in multiple qualities  
✅ Audio-only downloads (MP3)  
✅ Playlist support  
✅ User-friendly GUI  
✅ Command-line interface  
✅ Progress tracking  

## System Requirements
- Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
- Internet connection
- ~25 MB available disk space

## First Run
When you first run the application:
1. Windows may show a security warning (click "More info" → "Run anyway")
2. Some antivirus software may scan the file (this is normal)
3. The GUI will open - paste a YouTube URL to get started!

## Support
- Read the USER_GUIDE.md for detailed instructions
- For command-line usage: open cmd/PowerShell and run `YouTubeDownloader.exe --help`

---
Built with ❤️ using Python and PyInstaller
